testcase.name: Perform a search pagination from one page to another page on myntra
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the firefox browser........................................passed When User opens the Website url "http://www.myntra.com".....................passed And User enters search item "Shrug" in the myntra search bar................passed Then User should see all the search results for "Shrug" in myntra...........passed And User stores the initial page value of the webpage in myntra.............passed And User navigates to load the next page of search results in myntra........passed Then User should see the next set of search results in myntra...............passed And User navigates to load the previous page of search results in myntra....passed Then User should see the prev set of search results in myntra...............passed And User should close the browser...........................................passed
